uṭṭepeti：[uḍḍeti ① の caus．] 飛び立たせる，駆逐する． =uḍḍepeti

Uṭṭepeti，in phrase kāke u．“to scare crows away” （or to catch them in snares?） at Vin．I，79．Reading doubtful & should probably be read uḍḍepeti （? Caus．of uḍḍeti = oḍḍeti，or of uḍḍeti to make fly away）．The vv．ll．given to this passage are uṭṭeceti，upaṭṭhāpeti，uḍḍoyeti．See also uṭṭepaka．（Page 129）
